value.title: Export Power BI to MS Word / PDF | Paginated reports with Power Automate and Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to export a Power BI file to word or PDF and email it to somebody!!  Chapters: 00:00 Intro 00:35 Pre-requisites / Licenses 01:00 Prepare the word template 05:00 Configure the flow in Power BI  Done!
